mapper.select: select v.hotel_code hotel_code, v.hotel_pic hotel_pic, v.hotel_name hotel_name, v.hotel_eng hotel_eng, v.hotel_address hotel_address, hr.room_cat_desc room_cat, to_char(v.hotel_price, '999,999,999') hotel_price, to_char(trunc(v.hotel_price*(1 - hr.hotel_discount/100)), '999,999,999') discounted_price, hr.hotel_discount discount_ratio, hr.room_count room_count from (select * from hotel_room join hotel_room_cat using(room_cat)) hr join v_hotel_list v on hr.hotel_code = v.hotel_code where hr.hotel_discount > 0 order by hotel_discount desc

select distinct hp.hotel_code hotel_code, first_value(hotel_picture) over (partition by hp.hotel_code) as hotel_picture, review_title, review_comment from hotel_pic hp join (select rank() over(order by hotel_reserve_code desc) daterank, substr(hotel_reserve_code, 9, 6) hotel_code, review_title, review_comment from hotel_review) hr on hp.hotel_code = hr.hotel_code where daterank = 1
